response.original_title: マネーハンター美鈴 極嬢が企む甘くキケンな誘惑
response.overview: A mysterious beauty, Misuzu (Mei-rin), has come to Okinawa from Taiwan. Her goal is to find the 900,000 dollars that her dead father and his gang stole from the US military 20 years ago and hid somewhere. Misuzu successfully gets her hands on the money while seducing the men she meets through sex with her partner, Taku, and the love she develops with him. However, Sashimoto, a local yakuza boss who was involved in the robbery with her father, begins to move to steal the money. During the fight with Sashimoto and his men, Misuzu learns the secret of her own and Taku's birth...
response.title: Money Hunter Misuzu: Sweet and Dangerous Temptation Planned by a Top-Class Lady
